name: Phantom Thief
desc: "Calling Card" appears in the Action Order: After characters launch a Follow-Up ATK, their action advances by 5%. When taking action, advances the action of the first character in the lineup by 100%. After this character uses an attack, deals 10 instance(s) of "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 40% of the character's ATK, taking effect over a max of 4 attacks. Allies' "Aftertaste" DMG multiplier increases by 100% of the original multiplier, and a countdown with 100 SPD appears in the Action Order. The effects last until the countdown's turn begins.
